text: Valentino is a 1977 American biographical drama movie directed by Ken Russell and starring Rudolf Nureyev, Leslie Caron, Seymour Cassel, Carol Kane, Michelle Phillips and Penelope Milford. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1977 LGBT movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Russell Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies about actors
title: Valentino (1977 movie)
